Liono: ::peeks into see the preds attacking legendary Megatorn:: Ok I have 
the access codes lets make my most amazing entrance ever.  ::climbs in air 
ducks ok this is the main computer terminal jacks in::

Tigerhawk: OK we are near meltdown ::Starts and the core lets see the cooling 
vent need to be vented start venting:: Now that that's done lets release the 
core coolant and that should hold ::Core coolant is released:: now last types 
: CODE 1329 
Play message in engine room only.

Arc computer ::All threat to explosion has pasted::

Liono: Ok I'm all set here it goes ::Drops smoke bombs into the room with 
megatron and the preds:: I, AM BEAST THAT ROARS IN THE NIGHT! I AM THE TERROR 
THAT DESTROYS ALL PREDS WITHIN MY SIGHT. FOR ALL THOSE WHO OPPOSE ME WILL BE 
LOST IN MY HURRICANE OF DESTRUCTION. I AM BURNING CONVOY. ::AS A LIONO SLOW 
DESCENDS INTO THE ROOM HIS WINGS SPREAD WIDE LOOKING LIKE THE WINGED ANGEL OF 
DEATH AS HIS ARMS ARE FOLDED ACROSS HIS CHEST::

((Note Liono is not going all powerful.Also read this very Carefully it 
cotains info not to be over looked like when i say ::AS A LIONO SLOW DESCENDS 
INTO THE ROOM HIS WINGS SPREAD WIDE LOOKING LIKE THE WINGED ANGEL OF DEATH AS 
HIS ARMS ARE FOLDED ACROSS HIS CHEST:: it means it a Holoimage))
